name: com.playsolana.psdk
description: A Unity SDK for integrating PSG1 devices with Unity applications.
setupInstructions: Add this package via Unity Package Manager using the Git URL
Use MyJoystickDevice for custom controller support

samples.description: Sample project demonstrating how to use PSG1 input bindings. If you have a PSG1 device, you can use this sample to test the input system, otherwise you can create a virtual PSG1 device to test the input system. If you want to test input bindings, don't forget to assign InputActions as the Project-wide Input Actions.
